Package: org.grails.datastore.gorm

[Groovy] Trait GormValidateable

    • org.grails.datastore.gorm.GormValidateable

    • A trait that adds GORM validation behavior to any class

      Authors:
      Jeff Brown
      Graeme Rocher
      Since:
      4.0

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          org.springframework.validation.Errors  errors
          The validation errors object

      • Property Detail

        • org.springframework.validation.Errors errors

          The validation errors object

      • Method Detail

        • void clearErrors()

          Clears any errors that exist on an instance

        • static GormValidationApi currentGormValidationApi()

          Used to obtain the GormValidationApi instance. This method is used internally by the framework and SHOULD NOT be called by the developer

        • org.springframework.validation.Errors getErrors()

          Obtains the errors for an instance

          Returns:
          The org.springframework.validation.Errors instance

        • java.lang.Boolean hasErrors()

          Tests whether an instance has any errors

          Returns:
          True if errors exist

        • static void initInternalValidationApi(GormValidationApi gvi)

          Used to initialise the state of GORM. This method is used internally by the framework and SHOULD NOT be called by the developer

        • boolean validate(java.util.Map arguments)

          Validates an instance for the given arguments

          Parameters:
          arguments - The arguments to use
          Returns:
          True if the instance is valid

        • boolean validate(java.util.List fields)

          Validates an instance

          Parameters:
          fields - The list of fields to validate
          Returns:
          True if the instance is valid

        • boolean validate()

          Validates an instance

          Returns:
          True if the instance is valid
